title: Secondary History-Social Science Teaching Practices
description: Introduces prospective secondary teachers to principles and strategies of teaching history-social science by applying social science theory to classroom practice. Requires instructors to demonstrate the ability to teach state-adopted content standards in history-social science while enabling students to learn and use analytic thinking skills aligned with the California state standards. Prerequisites: ED78 Single Subject major only. Affirmed Single Subject candidate at UC San Diego who has advanced or consent of instructor.
